dict.string: Gain 10% of all damage done as Life.
Increases the chance of finding a health globe by 25% and you gain 100% additional health from health globes.
Critical hit chance increased by 5%. Critical hit damage increased by 50%. Many skills and runestone effects rely on critical hits to trigger their effects.

Gain a bonus based on the weapon type of your main hand weapon: Swords/Daggers: 10% increased damage Maces/Axes: 5% chance to critical hit Polearms/Spears: 10% attack speed Mighty Weapons: 1 Fury per hit
The duration of your shouts is doubled. While benefiting from War Cry or Battle Rage you regenerate 60% of your total Life per minute. Your shouts are: Battle Rage Threatning Shout War Cry
You inflict an additional 20% damage while at maximum Fury.
Increases Fury generation by 10% and maximum Fury is increased by 20. Fury is used to fuel your most powerful attacks.
Reduces all non-physical damage by 20%. Whenever you take damage from a ranged or elemental attack you gain 3 Fury.
Increases armor by 100%. Thorns damage dealt increased by 100%.

Increases the damage of Ancient Spear and Weapon Throw by 100%. In addition, killing an enemy with Ancient Spear automatically resets the cooldown and killing an enemy with Weapon Throw returns 20 Fury.
While below 20% Life, all skills cost no Fury and all damage taken is reduced by 50%.
As long as there are 5 enemies within 8 yards, all of your damage is increased by 30%.
The duration of control impairing effects on you are reduced by 20%. In addition, whenever you become stunned, feared or charmed you recover 15% of your maximum Life.
The cooldown on your Earthquake, Call of the Ancients and Wrath of the Berserker skills is reduced by 30 seconds.
You no longer degenerate Fury. Instead, you gain 1 Fury every 2 seconds.
Cause a shockwave that inflicts 80% weapon damage to enemies in a 26 yard line behind the targeted enemy.
Add 7 reverberation that causes 18% weapon damage per strike.
Each attack grants a 10% damage boost for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 8 times.
Gives each hit a 20% chance to stun the target for 3.5 seconds.
Brutally smash an enemy for 145% weapon damage with a 20% chance to knock the enemy back.
Enemies are severely demoralized. Each enemy has a 28% chance to flee for 2 - 9 seconds.
Affected enemies are also taunted to attack you for 9 seconds.
Affected enemies also have their attack speed reduced by 55%.
Affected enemies also have their movement speed reduced by 62%.
Enemies are badly shaken and have a 22% chance to drop additional treasure.
Shout with great ferocity, reducing damage done by enemies within 25 yards by 50% for 15 seconds.
Whenever you kill an enemy with Hammer of the Ancients every other nearby enemy has a 65% chance to be stunned for 3 seconds.
Strike a smaller area for 396% weapon damage.
Critical hits have a 55% chance to cause enemies to drop treasure or health globes.
Modifies the strike to create a shockwave that deals 172% weapon damage to all enemies in front of you.
Create a tremor at the point of impact that slows the movement speed of enemies by 40% and deals an additional 117% weapon damage over 2 seconds.
Call forth a massive hammer to smash enemies directly in front of you for 180% weapon damage. Hammer of the Ancients has a 15% increased chance to critical hit.
While under the effects of Battle Rage, critical hits cause an explosion of blood dealing 55% weapon damage to all nearby enemies.
Critical hits increase the duration of the Battle Rage effect by 4.0 seconds.
Critical hits have a 20% chance to cause enemies to drop additional treasure or health globes.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
Enter a rage which increases damage by 30% and critical hit chance by 4% for 30 seconds.
Enemies slain by this attack have a 100% chance to explode, causing 150% physical damage to all other enemies within 19 yards.
Increases damage to 260% weapon damage to the targeted enemy and 130% weapon damage to others in the arc.
Generate 1 Fury per enemy hit, up to 7 additional Fury total.
Draw enemies in from 26 yards away before the strike lands.
On critical hits, knock enemies back 22 yards and inflict 175% weapon damage to enemies where they land. Enemies knock each other back up to 8 times.
Swing in a wide arc to deal 120% weapon damage to the targeted enemy and 60% weapon damage to any other enemies caught in the swing.
While Ignore Pain is active, gain 40% of all damage dealt as Life.
Reflects 65% of ignored damage back at the enemy.
Knocks back all enemies within 28 yards when triggered and reduces cooldown time to 25 seconds. Also deals 50% weapon damage on affected enemies.
Extend the effect to nearby allies, reducing damage taken by 65% for 5.0 seconds.
Reduces all damage taken by 65% for 5 seconds.
Land with such force that enemies suffer a 100% chance to become stunned for 3 seconds.
Shockwaves burst forth from the ground at the destination and knock enemies toward you from 45.0 yards away.
Gain 700% additional armor for 4 seconds after landing.
Send enemies hurtling 6 yards into other nearby enemies who suffer 80% weapon damage and are pushed back in a chain up to 2 times.
Jump into the air with such great force that enemies within 7.5 yards of the origin of the jump take 160% weapon damage.
Leap into the air, dealing 40% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards of your destination. Only generates Fury if you hit an enemy.
Aim for the head, causing your target to be confused and attack other enemies for 9 seconds.
Increase thrown weapon damage to 462% weapon damage.
Expend all remaining Fury to throw a fallen foe which inflicts an additional 9% weapon damage for each point of Fury expended to all enemies within 22 yards of the target.
Angle the weapon to ricochet and hit up to 8 targets within 20 yards of each other.
Hurl a hammer with a 33% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Hurl a throwing weapon at an enemy for 210% weapon damage and slowing the movement of the enemy by 70% for 4 seconds.
Enemies in the area are slowed for 10 - 12 seconds after they recover from being stunned.
Increase Fury gained to 43 Fury per stomp.
Increase the area of effect to 33 yards. Enemies are pulled closer before the strike lands.
Enemies are knocked back 15 yards and inflict 175% weapon damage where they land.
Shake the ground to inflict 30% weapon damage to all enemies within 12 yards and stun them for 3 seconds. Only generates Fury if you hit an enemy.
Enemies killed while bleeding cause all enemies within 10 yards to begin bleeding for 100% weapon damage.
Increases damage to 123% weapon damage every second for 3 seconds.
Gain 40% of the damage done by Rend as Life.
Increases the range to deal 96% weapon damage every second for 3 seconds to all enemies within 14 yards.
Perform a vicious strike to all enemies within 9 yards, dealing 60% weapon damage every second for 3 seconds.
Killing a creature with Frenzy heals you for 25% Life over 6 seconds.
Each Frenzy effect also increases your damage by 24%.
Adds a 35% chance to call down a bolt of lightning from above, stunning your target for 3 seconds.
Each strike has a 55% chance to throw a piercing axe at a nearby enemy that deals 100% weapon damage to all enemies in its path.
While under the effects of Frenzy you gain 22% increased movement speed.
Swing for 80% weapon damage. Each swing increases attack speed of Frenzy by 15% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times for a total bonus of 75% attack speed.
After using Revenge, your critical strike chance is increased by 27% for 10 seconds.
Gain 7 Fury each time Revenge is used and improve Life gained from each enemy hit to 12.0%.
Increases the chance Revenge will become active for use to 31% each time you are hit by an attack.
Knocks enemies back 30 yards when Revenge is used.
Revenge has a 10% chance to become active for a short time each time you are hit by an attack.
Inflict 150% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards and gain 5.0% Life for each enemy hit.
Increases maximum Life by 50% and regenerates 479 Life per second while affected by War Cry.
Increases the Fury generated to 51 when used.
War Cry also grants 27% dodge bonus.
All of your resistances are increased by 80% while affected by War Cry.
Unleash a rallying cry to increase the armor of you and all allies within 30 yards by 100% for 60 seconds.
Cooldown is reduced by 1 second for every target hit. This effect can reduce the cooldown by up to 8 seconds.
Increase damage at the destination to 300% weapon damage.
Generate 8 Fury for each target hit while charging.
Regain 5% of your maximum Life for each target hit by Furious Charge.
Any targets who are critically hit by Furious Charge will be stunned for 5.0 seconds.
Rush forward knocking back enemies and inflicting 60% weapon damage to enemies at the destination and 30% damage to enemies along the path of the charge. Only generates Fury if you hit an enemy.
Reflect 45% of incoming melee damage for 17 seconds after Overpower is activated.
Whenever used, your chance to critical hit is increased by 22% for 6.0 seconds.
Overpower generates 7 Fury for every enemy hit.
Throw up to 9 axes at nearby enemies which inflict 240% weapon damage each.
Heal 18% of your maximum Life whenever Overpower is used.
Overpower becomes available whenever you make a critical hit against an enemy.
Press the advantage of a powerful attack to overwhelm the enemy for 150% weapon damage to all targets within 9 yards.
Focus the seismic shockwaves along a narrow path to inflict 441% weapon damage to targets along a 42 yard path.
Increase damage to 366% weapon damage and increases the knockback by 225%.
The ground continues to shudder after the intitial strike, damaging enemies in the area for 160% weapon damage.
Adds a 100% chance of stunning enemies for 3 seconds.
Slam the ground to cause a wave of destruction that deals 215% weapon damage and knockback to targets in a 45 yard arc.
Project secondary tremors up to 12 yards ahead of you that inflict 260% weapon damage.
Secondary tremors knock enemies back and inflict 260% weapon damage.
Reduce Fury cost to 40 Fury and the cooldown to 50 seconds.
Secondary tremors follow your movement and inflict 260% weapon damage.
Creates an icy patch causing Eathquake's damage to turn cold and slow the movement of enemies by 62%.
Shake the ground violently dealing 240% weapon damage followed by an additional 150% weapon damage per second for 8 seconds to all enemies within 15 yards.
Enemies hit with Ancient Spear will be tossed in the opposite direction and damage is increased to 143% weapon damage.
Pierce through up to 8 enemies in a straight line and drag them all back.
Throw 8 spears. Each spear will pull back the enemy that it hits.
Gain Life equal to 700% of the damage inflicted.
Throw a spear up to 45 yards to pull an enemy back to you, slowing target's movement by 50% and dealing 55% weapon damage.
Slams through enemies, knocking them back and inflicting 200% weapon damage.
Increases the movement speed bonus to 110% for 20 seconds.
Increase the movement speed of allies within 30 yards by 40% for 6 seconds.
Increase dodge chance by 22% while sprinting.
Tornadoes rage in the wake of the Sprint, each one inflicting 200% weapon damage.
Increase movement speed by 40% for 6 seconds.
Talic gains the ability Leap Attack which deals 360% of your weapon damage to enemies in the area of the leap.
Korlic gains the ability Furious Charge which deals 280% of your weapon damage to all enemies in a line.
The Ancients inflict 275% weapon damage with each attack and have 175% additional armor.
Madawc gains the ability Seismic Slam which deals 205% of your weapon damage to enemies in an arc.
Summon the ancient Barbarians Talic, Korlic, and Madawc to inflict 100% weapon damage with each attack as they join the battle for 15 seconds.
Talic wields a sword and shield and uses the Whirlwind skill. Korlic wields a massive polearm and uses the Cleave skill. Madawc dual-wields axes and uses the Weapon Throw skill.
Critical strikes restore 7% of your maximum Life.
Turns Whirlwind into a torrent of magma that inflicts 84% weapon damage every 0.40 seconds.
Reduce the cost of Whirlwind to 4.5 Fury per second.
Generate harsh tornadoes that inflict 90% weapon damage to enemies in their path.
Increase the movement speed of Whirlwind by 85%.
Deliver multiple attacks to everything in your path for 44% weapon damage every 0.40 seconds.
Killing an enemy while Wrath of the Berserker is active causes them to explode dealing 450% weapon damage to all enemies within 15 yards.
While active your damage is also increased by 75%.
Every 9 Fury gained while Wrath of the Berserker is active adds 1 second to the duration of the effect.
Activating Wrath of the Berserker knocks back all enemies within 12 yards and deals 550% weapon damage to them.
Increase the bonus dodge chance granted to 60%.
Enter a berserker rage which raises several attributes for 15 seconds.
Critical Hit: 10% Attack Speed: 45% Dodge Chance: 20% Movement Speed: 20%
An arrow skill that does bonus damage and has a seeking property, much like the Amazon's Guided Arrow from Diablo II.
A bolt that seeks out enemies and does X% damage and has an Y% chance to pierce the target.

This debuff skill deals solid damage, as well as slowing the target. Nearby enemies may be chained as well, potentially slowing several monsters and blocking the movement of all that are stuck behind them.
Release a sticky adhesive that deals X% weapon damage and entangles up to X enemies, slowing their movement speed by X% for X seconds.

This skill, instantly nicknamed "knife nova," shoots out numerous blades, dealing considerable physical damage to any targets nearby. The range is very short, hardly more than a melee weapon, making this one best used in very close range against multiple targets.
Throw knives out in a spiral around you doing X-X damage to all enemies within X feet of you. Your knives will also slow enemies by X% for X seconds.

The Demon Hunter uses a bow or crossbow to fire a spinning projectile; two bombs on a length of rope. The Bola hits the target and wraps around it, dealing minimal impact damage but considerably more explosive damage after a couple of seconds.

Shoot out an explosive Bola that wraps itself around its target. After X seconds the Bola explodes, dealing X% weapon damage to the target and an additional X% weapon damage to all targets within X feet.

A fast movement skill, this allows the Demon Hunter to move a considerable distance at high speed, passing through monsters and other players, though not through solid objects or over open space, as Teleport or Leap Attack does.

Grenades are small projectiles thrown by the Demon Hunter. They bounce around, ricocheting off of walls and other obstacles, before exploding a couple of seconds after they are thrown. They deal considerable fire damage, but are hard to aim precisely, and are best used against large mobs, especially to hit targets located in the back row.
Throw out three grenades that explode for X-X fire damage.
This trap/object is placed and triggers when enemies move into range.You can have a maximum for X traps active at one time.
Lay a trap that arms after X seconds and triggers when an enemy approaches. The explosion does X-X damage per second to all enemies within X feet for X seconds.

The Diablo II favorite returns. This skill fires a huge cluster of arrows or bolts, guaranteeing a hit on everything in range. The mana cost is fairly high and the damage is lower than most single arrow attacks, making it best used against huge groups.
Fire a massive volley of arrows dealing X% weapon damage.
Sentry creates a mechanical turret that fires arrows at enemies, working much like the Wizard's Hydra skill.
The Demon Hunter can have a maximum of X traps active at one time.
The Demon Hunter fires an arrow that hits the ground, and grenades erupt from the consequent blast, which in turn explode to damage enemies.
Reduces the cost of Hatred-based skills by 50%.
Increases the basic damage done by the Demon Hunter's weapon by 100%.
Reduces the cost of Discipline-based skills by 20%.
Increases damage dealt to slowed targets by 20%.
When a Discipline-based skill is used, damage dealt by the Demon Hunter is increased by 10% for 10 seconds. Can stack up to three times.
Increases damage dealt by rockets (?) by 100%. The rocket effect is provided by certain runestones.
When Hatred is at its maximum, run speed is increased by 10%.
When an enemy is killed by the Demon Hunter, the next attack dealt within the next 5 seconds has 30%% increased critical strike chance.
When Discipline is under 20%, the regeneration of Hatred is increased by 30%.
When wielding two weapons, the character has 20% increased critical strike chance and 30% increased critical strike damage.
Increases the duration of auras by 120 seconds.
After dealing a critical strike, increases dodge chance by 10% for 10 seconds.
When the Monk dodges an attack, the next skill has its Spirit cost reduced by 40%.
Healing effects are improved by 50% if the Monk is under 35% health.
When the Monk receives a fatal blow, the Monk gains 30% health and 30% Spirit.
Skills that generate Spirit (i.e. combos) do 20% more damage.
Skills that require Spirit do 30% more damage.

Creates a flash of light that blinds all nearby enemies. Blinded enemies will not attack unless they are attacked first. Lasts for X-X seconds. Blinded enemies have a X% reduced chance to hit. Rank One: Blinds enemies for 3-4 seconds, 20% reduced chance to hit. Rank Two: Blinds enemies for 3-5 seconds, 25% reduced chance to hit.

One of two low-level combo skills available to the Monk, this punching attack lands three not-very quick hits, dealing increasing amounts of lightning damage with each attack. Generates 3 Spirit per hit.
Unleashes a series of increasingly powerful lightning infused punches that deal X% weapon damage as lightning damage, and has a higher chance than normal to interrupt enemy attacks.
A curing, cleansing spell that removes debuffs from the Monk and his party.
The Monk banishes any harmful effects from himself and his allies, including stun, slowing, and effects that reduce defensive or offensive abilities.
A roundhouse kick that knocks back enemies.
The Monk unleashes a deadly roundhouse kick, causing knockback and dealing X-X physical damage. Rank One: 25 Spirit, Deals 10-20 Physical damage.
A fast moving, charge-like attack, more useful for the movement than the damage dealt.
The Monk dashes quickly at the targeted enemy or location, dealing X% weapon damage plus X-X physical damage.

The Monk creates an illusion of himself composed of pure holy energy. This illusion attracts enemies to it, and then it explodes dealing X-X holy damage. Rank One: Costs 40 Spirit, Explodes for 10-20 holy damage
A debuff combo, this one slows enemies, while dealing fairly minor damage. Best mixed in for the first or second hit with another more impactful combo.

A series of large sweeping attacks that debilitate enemies and cause X% weapon damage. First Hit: Enemies are dazed, reducing movement speed by X% for X seconds. Second and Third Hit: Refreshes the duration of the daze effect.
A defensive skill that creates a small protected circle around the Monk into which no monster can enter. Spells and ranged attacks will still strike the Monk though.
Creates a protected region on the ground for X seconds that cannot be passed through.

This skill became an instant legend when the Monk debuted at Blizzcon 2009. It's a combo skill that deals two light damage hits, before the third booby traps the target with a beating heart visible above their head. If a monster dies with the heart still there, they explode in a supernova of blood, dealing substantial AoE damage to all nearby enemies.

A series of lethal strikes target enemy nerve clusters that sets up a deadly chain reaction within the target. Deals X% weapon damage. Third Hit: Target bleeds for X physical damage over X seconds. If the target dies it explodes dealing X-X% of maximum health in physical damage to all enemies nearby.
The Monk sweeps his weapon in a circle, forming a barrier of force that deals X% weapon damage to every enemy hit. Can hit enemies multiple times.
The Monk creates a shield that protects him from all incoming damage. Lasts X seconds.

One of the most popular combo skills, this attack lands a crushing series of body shots on the enemy. It was shown in modified form in the Monk cinematic; used to pulverize the ribs of a Morlu Caster.
A series of punches strike enemies in front of the Monk that cause X% weapon damage.

A very powerful attack, when used in Blizzcon 2009 this skill allowed the Monk to teleport to an enemy, to strike it or other nearby enemies five times, and all without ever being hit in return. It was expected to be nerfed, and has not been seen in action since.
Unleashes a fury of attacks striking nearby enemies X times for X% weapon damage for each hit.
The Monk summons a rolling wave of holy fire that scorches everything in its path, dealing X holy damage.
The Witch Doctor uses a blowpipe to fire a poison dart. A fairly slow attack that's hugely improved by runestones.
Fires a deadly poison dart that deals X-X poison damage and an additional X-X poison damage over X seconds.

Better known as "Mongrels," Zombie Dogs are the basic Witch Doctor pet, capable of tanking and fighting effectively, though they are not meant for a long life, and deal their best damage when Sacrificed.
The Witch Doctor summons a level X zombie dog to aid him. Can have up to X zombie dogs out at a time.
The Witch Doctor summons several toads that hop forward like living Charged Bolts and explode against enemies. Some dramatic runestone effects are known for this skill.
Release a handful of toads that explode on contact with an enemy, dealing poison damage.
A powerful curse, this one deals damage as well as slowing enemies for a short duration.
Hands reach out, slowing enemies by X% and dealing X-X damage per second for X seconds.
A ranged spell attack, this sics a ghostly entity upon the target, dealing DoT. The Haunt will seek a new target when its victim dies.
Haunt an enemy with a spirit dealing X arcane damage over X seconds. If the target dies, the spirit will automatically haunt another nearby target.

A zombie is summoned, which charges straight in the direction specified, melting into nothing and dealing poison damage to any targes along the way. A runestone can grant the infamous Zombie Bears effect.
A reckless, suicidal zombie deals X-X poison damage to all enemies in its way.
A curse of sorts, this one causes damage and blocks the afflicted's ability to attack.
Summon a fetish shaman for X seconds that will hex enemies into chickens. Hexed enemies are unable to perform offensive actions and will take X% additional damage.
Spiders emerge from a rotting zombie corpse and launch themselves at nearby enemies, dealing poison damage with their swarming bites.
Summon X spiders to attack nearby enemies.

A powerful curse, this one frightens nearby enemies into running away for a few seconds. The radius emanates from the Witch Doctor, not from the spot targeted when cast, so it only works on enemies who are very nearby.
Don a spectral mask that horrifies all enemies within X feet, causing them to run in fear for X seconds.
A short range spell attack, this sends flaming bats out in an Inferno-like spray, dealing damage to anything in their path.
A swarm of fiery bats burn enemies in front of you for X fire damage per second.

Previously known as Skull of Flame, this is a ranged attack that's thrown like a grenade. It deals explodes on impact, dealing considerable fire damage. The projectile is a human skull, filled with an explosive liquid.
Lob an explosive skull that deals X-X fire damage to all enemies caught in the explosion.
A powerful movement/escape skill, especially useful in the Battle Arena. The Witch Doctor leaves his physical body behind as a decoy and can run freely, invisible, for several seconds.
Enter the spirit realm, allowing unhindered movement for X seconds.
A buff that increases the WD's spell damage based on how many enemies are nearby.
Feed on the life force of nearby enemies. Gain X% increased spell damage per enemy within X feet for X seconds.
This skill causes a Mongrel to detonate in a huge spray of purple and pink smoke, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies.
A nearby zombie dog explodes, dealing X damage to all enemies within X yards.
A large, powerful zombie pet that tanks for the Witch Doctor.
Summon a large level X zombie follower to fight for you.

A ranged spell attack, this sends out a cloud of locusts that swarm over enemies, eating their flesh from the bones. Locusts will chain between nearby enemies, potentially consuming numerous targets per cast.
A plague of locusts assault enemies dealing X damage per second over X seconds. The locusts will jump to additional nearby targets.
A Death from Above attack that's never yet been shown publicly. Acid Cloud covers a small radius, so presumably this one has a larger radius.
A multitude of spirit bolts bombard enemies in the targeted area. Each bolt deals X-X arcane damage.
Originally a Wizard spell, this one was moved to the Witch Doctor to provide a DfA attack with a small radius that melts the flesh from the bones of anything in the targeted area.
Acid rains down dealing an initial X-X poison damage followed by X-X poison damage per second to nearby enemies who remain in the area.
A mind control spell that temporarily changes the alignment of some enemies.
Incite paranoia in enemies, causing some to fight for the Witch Doctor for X seconds.

One of the showier Witch Doctor skills to be displayed in the early announcement, this one causes a wall of zombies to erupt from the earth. The WoZ blocks the progress of enemies as well as dealing physical damage to anything in range.
Zombies erupt from the earth and attack nearby enemies for X damage per second.
The Witch Doctor is able to summon Fetishes, versions of the monsters from Diablo II, to fight for him. Never yet publicly seen.
Summon an army of fetish creatures to fight by your side for X seconds.
Regenerates 2% of maximum mana per second.
Increases the health of pets by 60%.
Health globes provide 10% of maximum mana when picked up.
When the Witch Doctor has under 35% health, damage taken is reduced by 20%.
Increases damage dealt by Zombie Dogs by 6%.
30% of mana costs for skills is taken from health instead.
Increases Animal and Plague skill damage by 20%.
Increases damage by 15% of health. (Unknown if max or current health.)
If Frost Nova hits at least 5 targets, you gain 45% chance to critically hit for 12 seconds.
Enemies take 110% more damage while frozen or chilled by Frost Nova.
A frozen enemy that is killed has a 70% chance of exploding in a smaller Frost Nova causing 34 - 60 Cold damage.
The Frost Nova no longer freezes enemies, but instead leaves behind a mist of frost for 8 seconds that deals 32 Cold damage per second to enemies standing in it.
An explosion of ice freezes nearby enemies for 4 seconds and causes 28 - 50 Cold damage.
Missiles track the nearest target and damage is increased to 72 - 110 Arcane damage.
Whenever Magic Missile hits a target you gain 14 Arcane Power.
Fires 8 missiles that do 20 - 31 damage each.
Missiles have a 100% chance to pierce through their target and hit additional targets.
Launch a missile of magic energy causing 40 - 61 Arcane damage.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
Attacks have a 55% chance to create a Frost Nova on the attacker dealing 78 - 85 Cold damage.
Attackers take 30 - 38 Cold damage and are chilled for 5.5 seconds.
Whenever you are struck by a melee attack the bonus armor granted by Ice Armor is increased by 85% for 10 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.
Lower the temperature of the air around you. Nearby enemies are chilled, slowing their movement and attack speed, for 3.0 seconds.
A whirling storm of ice builds around you that deals 57 - 71 Cold damage per second for 16 seconds after casting Ice Armor.
Surround yourself in a barrier of ice that increases armor by 50%, and causes 7 - 9 Cold damage to melee attackers, chilling them for 2 seconds. Lasts 120 seconds.
This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
Slain enemies have a 100% chance to explode dealing 124 - 252 Lightning damage to every enemy within 10 yards.
Casts out bolts of fire to deal 73 - 148 Fire damage per bolt.
Every target hit by a pulse restores 7 Arcane Power.
Turn the bolts into a floating orb of static lightning that drifts directly forward, zapping up to 5 nearby enemies for 18 - 35 Lightning damage.
Merge the bolts in a a single giant orb that oscillates forward dealing 36 - 72 Lightning damage to everything it hits with a 100% chance to pierce through enemies.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
Release a pulse of 3 unpredictable charges of electricity that deal 36 - 72 Lightning damage to enemies they hit.
Increases the distance enemies are knocked back and stuns all affected enemies for 5.0 seconds.
Increases damage to 203 - 234 physical damage but reduces knockback.
Reduce casting cost to 11 Arcane Power and cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.
Enemies hit have a 100% chance to cause a smaller Wave of Force that does 46 - 53 physical damage and knocks back enemies caught in its wake.
Enemies caught in the wave have a 70% chance to randomly teleport to somewhere else nearby.
Explode a wave of pure energy that repels projectiles and knocks back nearby enemies. This also slows the movement of enemies by 50% and deals 92 - 107 physical damage to them.
Whenever the blades do critical damage, you are healed 100% of the damage caused.
Enemies hit by the blade will bleed for an additional 45% weapon damage done over 3 seconds.
Every enemy hit grants 7 Arcane Power.
Extends the blades out to reach everything within 20 yards dealing 72% weapon damage.
Hits have a 45% chance to cause knockback and slow the movement of enemies by 60% for 2 seconds.
Summon a spectral blade that strikes all enemies in your path 3 times causing 35% weapon damage with each hit.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
Critical hits with this skill cause an explosion of 5 charged bolts in random directions, dealing 1 - 82 Lightning damage to any targets hit.
Creates a streak of lightning that pierces targets, hitting all enemies in its path for 1 - 70 Lightning damage.
Gain 7 Arcane Power for every target hit by Electrocute.
Increases the maximum number of jumps to 10 enemies.
Blast a cone of lightning that causes 1 - 65 Lightning damage to all affected targets.
Lightning arcs from your fingertips towards an enemy dealing 1 - 59 Lightning damage. The lightning can jump, hitting up to 2 enemies. Damage is reduced by 30% for each jump.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
Melee hits recover 45% of damage caused as Life.
Melee attacks burn enemies with fire for 70% of weapon damage for 3 seconds.
Melee attacks cause lightning to arc to 8 nearby enemies dealing 18% of weapon damage as Lightning damage.
Increases damage bonus to 34% physical damage, and gives a 45% chance to knock back any enemies hit.
Imbue your weapon with magical energy granting it 20% increased physical damage. Can only affect melee weapons. Lasts 60 seconds.
The orb will pierce through targets, damaging any enemy it passes through dealing 154 - 211 Arcane damage.
Increase the potency of the explosion to deal 297 - 406 Arcane damage.
Reduce casting cost to 21 Arcane Power.
Modify the orb to deal 135 - 185 Arcane damage to all enemies within 16 yards.
Create 4 Arcane Orb(s) that orbit you, exploding for 162 - 222 Arcane damage when enemies get close.
Hurl an orb of pure energy that explodes when it hits, dealing 135 - 185 Arcane damage to all enemies within 10 yards.
When Diamond Skin wears off, diamond shards will explode in all directions dealing 18 - 36 physical damage to enemies nearby.
Reflects 160% of damage absorbed back at the attacker.
Reduce Arcane Power cost of all spells by 14 while Diamond Skin is active.
Increase the maximum absorption amount to 6919 damage.
Transform your skin to diamond for 5 seconds absorbing up to 2661 damage from incoming attacks.
Twister no longer travels but spins in place dealing 38 Arcane damage per second to everything caught within it.
Increase damage to 60 Arcane damage per second.
Reduce casting cost to 14 Arcane Power.
When two twisters touch they merge into a tornado with an increased area of effect that causes 32 Arcane damage per second.

Casting Energy Twister grants you a Wind Charge. You can store up to 5 Wind Charges at a time. Casting a Signature spell releases all Wind Charges as a giant Energy Twister that deals 11 - 18 damage per Wind Charge.
Unleash a twister of pure energy that deals 27 Arcane damage per second to everything caught within it.
Enemies killed by the beam have a 35% chance to explode causing 153 - 177 Arcane damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Damage increases slowly over time to inflict a maximum of 188 - 234 Arcane damage per second.
When casting the beam you become charged with energy that spits out at nearby enemies doing 68 - 85 Arcane damage.
Increase the width of the beam allowing it to hit more enemies for 111 - 139 Arcane damage per second.
The beam fractures into a short ranged cone causing 114 - 153 Arcane damage per second.
Thrust a beam of pure energy forward dealing 85 - 107 Arcane damage per second and disintegrating enemies it kills.
Whenever you cast a spell that critically hits, you also shock a nearby enemy for 2 - 153 Lightning damage.
Increase the damage of the shock to 2 - 135 Lightning damage.
Reduce the cost of all abilities by 7 Arcane Power while Storm Armor is active.
Increase your movement speed by 20% for 5 seconds whenever you are hit by melee or ranged attack.
Whenever you are hit you are enveloped with a lightning shield for 8 seconds that shocks nearby enemies for 1-74 Lightning damage.
Bathe yourself in electrical energy, shocking ranged and melee attackers for 1 - 61 Lightning damage. Lasts 120 seconds.
This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
8 consecutive explosions cascade off you that each cause 50 - 67 physical damage.
An energy explosion fires immediately for 169 - 229 physical damage.
Reduces the casting cost to 24 Arcane Power.
Increase the explosion radius to 18 yards for 169 - 229 physical damage.
The blast detonates from the point it was originally cast after 2 seconds for 204 - 277 physical damage.
Gather an infusion of energy around you that explodes after 2 seconds, causing 99 - 135 physical damage to any nearby enemies.
When an image is destroyed it explodes, doing 78 - 142 physical damage and has 50% chance to stun enemies it hits for 5 seconds.
Spells the images cast will do 70% of the damage as your own.
The duration of the images is increased to 31 seconds and increases the Life of your images to 60% of your Life.
Summons 6 illusionary duplicates that have 25% of your Life each.
Increases the Life of your images to 125% of your Life.
Summon 2 illusionary duplicates of yourself that last for 15 seconds and have 25% of your Life. The images may cast some of the same spells as you, but those spells deal no damage.
Time is sped up for any friendly heroes standing in the bubble, increasing attack and cast speed by 140%.
Enemies caught in the bubble of warped time take 140% more damage.
Slow Time effects cling to enemies for 14 seconds after they have left the bubble.
Reduces the size of the Slow Time bubble to 10 yards, but increases the effect, slowing movement and attack speed of enemies by 60% while inside the bubble.
Invoke a bubble of warped time and space for 10 seconds, slowing the movement and attack speed of enemies by 35%. This bubble also slows the movement of enemy projectiles by 90%.
After casting Teleport there is a 2.0 second delay before the cooldown begins.
Casts a low power Wave of Force on arrival dealing 85 - 92 physical damage to all enemies nearby.
Casting Teleport again within 8 seconds will instantly bring you back to your original location.
Summon 2 mirror images for 15 seconds on arrival.
For 16 seconds after you appear you will take 25% less damage.
Teleport through the ether to the selected location up to 35 yards away.
Summon Arcane Hydras that spit Arcane Orbs which explode on impact causing 22 - 26 Arcane damage to enemies near the explosion.
Summon Frost Hydras that breathe a short range cone of frost causing 30 - 35 Cold damage to all enemies in the cone.
Summon one Mammoth Hydra that breathes a wall of flame at nearby enemies dealing 38 - 45 Fire damage per second to enemies caught in the burning ground.
Summon Lightning Hydras that shock enemies for 41 - 48 Lightning damage.
Summon Poison Breathing Hydras that leave a pool of acid causing 15 - 18 Poison damage per second to enemies who remain in the pool.
Summon a multi-headed Hydra for 9 seconds that attacks enemies with bolts of fire dealing 18 - 22 Fire damage per attack.
Enemies who die leave a patch of ice on the ground that causes 199 - 234 Cold damage per second to enemies moving through it.
Damage increases slowly over 1.5 seconds to inflict a maximum of 369 - 434 Cold damage per second.
Reduce casting cost to 3 Arcane Power per second.
Create a swirling storm of sleet dealing 99 - 107 Cold damage per second to all enemies caught within it.
Increase enemy slow amount to 50% for 8.5 seconds, but damage is reduced to 114 - 134 Cold damage per second.
Project a beam of frozen ice that blasts 142 - 167 Cold damage per second to the first enemy it hits, slowing the target's movement by 40% and attack speed by 30% for 5 seconds.
Also increases your Precision by 40% while Energy Armor is active.
Increases all of your resistances by 180% while Energy Armor is active.
Gain 7 Arcane Power whenever you are hit by an ranged or melee attack.
Rather than reducing your maximum Arcane Power, it is increased by 40 while Energy Armor is active.
While Energy Armor is active, incoming attacks that would deal more than 26% of your maximum Life are reduced to deal 26% of your maximum Life instead.
Focus your energies, increasing your Defense by 20% but lowers your maximum Arcane Power by 20. Lasts 120 seconds.
This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
Unleash the torrent beyond your control. You can no longer direct where the projectiles go but their damage is increased to 199 - 249 Arcane damage.
Targets hit by Arcane Torrent become Disrupted for 6 seconds, causing them to take 120% additional damage from any attacks that deal Arcane damage.
Every missile hit has a 8% chance to leave behind a Power Stone that grants Arcane Power when picked up.
Enemies killed by Arcane Torrent have a 95% chance to fire a new missile at a nearby enemy dealing 50 - 99 Arcane damage.

Instead of firing projectiles, lay Arcane mines that arm after 1 second. These mines explode when an enemy approaches, dealing 114 - 142 Arcane damage. Enemies caught in the explosion have their movement and attack speeds reduced by 30% for 3 seconds.
Hurl a barrage of arcane projectiles that deal 107 - 181 Arcane damage per second to all enemies near the impact location.
If the initial impact critically hits any targets the molten fire duration is increased to 18 seconds.
Increase the damage of the meteor impact to 469 - 641 Fire damage and the molten fire will do an additional 63 - 94 Fire damage over 3 seconds.
Reduce casting cost to 39 Arcane Power.
Unleash a volley of 14 smaller meteors that strike for 139 - 189 Fire damage.

Transforms the meteor to ice that deals 298 - 408 Cold damage on impact and freezes the ground, causing 40 - 60 Cold damage over 3 seconds. The movement of enemies in the area will also be slowed by 60%.

Summon an immense meteor that plummets from the sky causing 213 - 291 Fire damage to all enemies it crashes into. The ground it hits is scorched with molten fire that does 28 - 43 Fire damage over 3 seconds.
Enemies caught in the storm have a 52% chance to be frozen for 3 seconds and the critical strike chance with Blizzard is increased by 80%.
Increase the duration of the Blizzard to 10 seconds.
Reduce the casting cost to 24 Arcane Power.
Increase the size of the Blizzard to cover 22 yards, and deal 136 - 188 Cold damage per second.
After the Blizzard ends, cover the ground in a low lying mist for 6.0 seconds that slows any enemies who enters it.
Call down shards of ice to pelt an area dealing 57 - 78 Cold damage per second for 3 seconds.
While you are below 25% Life the Familiar will absorb up to 8 attacks directed at you. If it absorbs all its attacks it will disintegrate.
Increase damage of all attacks by 40% while Familiar is active.
While the Familiar is active you regenerate 270 Arcane Power per minute.
Familiar's projectiles explode on impact dealing 5 - 8 Arcane damage to all enemies within 10 yards.
Familiar's projectiles have a 100% chance to pierce through enemies.
Summon a companion that will attack your targets for 5 - 9 Arcane damage. This companion cannot be targeted or damaged by enemies. Pet lasts 60 seconds.
An explosion errupts when you transform causing 568 - 852 Arcane damage to all enemies within 15 yards.
Increase damage of all Archon abilities by 120%.
Decrease the cooldown of Archon to 80 seconds.
Archon form can now cast a Slow Time that lasts for 20 seconds.
Archon form can now cast Teleport with a cooldown of 3 seconds.

Transform into a being of pure arcane energy for 15 seconds. While in Archon form your normal abilities are replaced by powerful Archon abilities, and your armor and resistances are increased by 40%. Every enemy killed while in Archon form adds 1 second to the duration of Archon.
Gain 30 Arcane Power whenever you are healed by a health globe.
Whenever you deal Arcane damage, enemies are slowed by 24% for 2 seconds.
Increases all damage done by 20% but decreases armor and resistances by 10%.
Every time you cast an Academic spell, you gain 5 Arcane Power. The following skills are Academic spells: Magic Missile, Shock Pulse, Spectral Blade, Electrocute
Increases the damage of your basic wand attack by 100%. Successful attacks with a wand generate 15 Arcane Power and heal you for 1% of your maximum Life.
Increases your maximum Arcane Power by 20 and Arcane Power regeneration by 2 per second.
Whenever you suffer more than 15% of your Life in a single hit the cooldown on your Mirror Image and Teleport abilities is automatically reset.
Increases the duration of your armor spells by 120 seconds. As long as an Armor spell is active, you gain 3 Life per second. The following skills are improved: Energy Armor, Ice Armor, Storm Armor

When you deal damage with a Signature spell you gain a Flash of Insight. After 8 Flashes of Insight your next non-Signature spell deals 50% additional damage. You cannot gain a Flash of Insight more than once every 1.5 seconds.
When reduced below 20% Life release a shockwave that knocks all enemies back. This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 seconds.
